sentences.sContent: So every once in a while, turn off your phone and laptop, switch off the TV and lay your worries temporarily to the side.
sentences.sContent_eng: So every once in a while, turn off your phone and laptop, switch off the TV and lay your worries temporarily to the side.
sentences.sCn: 因此不妨偶尔关掉你的电话，电脑和电视，把烦恼暂时放在一边，和自己（或是你的同伴）约个会， 至少完整的

synos.tran: 偶尔；有时（等于every once in a while）
